functions.tag: {HideFlags:64,Unbreakable:true,display:{Name:'{"translate":"可愛い服にも棘がある","color":"red","bold":true,"italic":false}',Lore:['[{"text":"❖ ","color":"","italic":false},{"translate":"%1$s%2$s(VII)","color":"white","with":[{"translate":"棘の"},{"translate":"刻印"}]}]','{"translate":"内側にも外側にも棘がついてる。痛い。","color":"dark_red","bold":true,"italic":false}'],color:13719867},Engraving:{EnchantID:"棘",Tier:7},AttributeModifiers:[{AttributeName:"generic.max_health",Name:"カスタム",Amount:-4.9dd,Operation:0,UUID:[I;23,0,0,10],Slot:"legs"},{AttributeName:"generic.attack_damage",Name:"カスタム",Amount:3.5d,Operation:1,UUID:[I;23,0,0,41],Slot:"legs"},{AttributeName:"generic.armor_toughness",Name:"カスタム",Amount:2.1d,Operation:0,UUID:[I;23,0,0,70],Slot:"legs"},{AttributeName:"generic.armor",Name:"デフォルト",Amount:2,Operation:0,UUID:[I;23,0,1,60],Slot:"legs"}]}
